entry.summary: The dates listed as AVAILABLE are the only dates that are open…
entry.content:
The dates listed as AVAILABLE are the only dates that are open for rentals, any other date is subject to the property owers discretion. If you require a specific date please contact: hunter.ranch.makaha@icloud.com

2023

  1. Augusts 4-6, 18-20
  2. September 1-3, 8-10, 22-24
  3. October 6-8, 13-15, 20-22
  4. November 3-5, 10-12, 24-26
  5. December 8-10, 15-17, 29-31

entry.title: Rental Rules and Requirements
entry.summary: Insurance All rentals must provide PROOF OF INSURANCE prior to deposit. Eventsured…
entry.content:
Insurance

All rentals must provide PROOF OF INSURANCE prior to deposit.

Eventsured

Special Event Insurance

Rules for All Guests

  1. The main house is off limits to all guests, no guest may enter the home
  2. All guests must clean up after themselves, we have pets that live here, please do not leave food waste on the grass. Bones and other food may be lethal to animals
  3. Garbage must be cleaned and taken to the bins at the front of the house, we are limited to 1 garbage bag per guest, if guests have more than one bag of waste, please take the bags to the dump or pay $75.00 for a dump deposit and have us remove the waste on your behalf
  4. No permanent fixtures, attachments or other alterations may be made on property. Any attachments must be temporary and non damaging.
  5. The tiny house must be left clean, please tidy up and remove any waste upon exit
  6. Please reduce music past 9:00 pm 
  7. No pets allowed
  8. There is NO lifeguard, swim at your own risk.
  9. Do not block the gates, or any access to the house
  10. Do not close the gates without asking in advance
  11. Do not drive on the grass or any of the lawn areas
  12. NO fireworks, sparklers or other explosives

BBQ/Fire Pit rules

  1. Please use the appropriate fuel when lighting any of the bbq/fire pit areas
  2. Ensure you have a bucket of water or sand near by and watch for sparks
  3. Do not light the fire pit if there are high winds or we have informed you it is unsafe to burn at this time

BBQ and grill must be left clean, ashes/coal disposed of approrpiately 

Fruit Picking Guide/Rules

  1. Guests are welcome to pick and use fruit from any of the trees on property as long as they limit themselves to taking no more than 1 piece per person and do not harm or destroy any plants in the process.
  2. We have oranges, pink lemons, limes, finger limes, paypaya, coconut, apple bannanas, avacado, strawberry guava and standard mangos on property.
  3. We are planning a large vegetable garden in the front as well, and we will be offering baskets per guest at a cost of $10.00 a basket for an assorment of vegetables if you wish to take some homegrown items home or use them in eating on site.

entry.title: Rental Prices & Options
entry.summary: Hunter Ranch Makaha is available for rentals EVERY OTHER Friday, Saturday and…
entry.content:
Hunter Ranch Makaha is available for rentals EVERY OTHER Friday, Saturday and Sunday. Full dates are available on our calendar page. Reservations are first come first serve and are confirmed once a deposit has been made. We require a 50% deposit 24 hours after booking to confirm your rental. Deposits by check will be confirmed once cleared.

All Bronze Rentals include:

  1. Parking for up to 10 cars along the front and sides
  2. Use of the outdoor bar/eating area
  3. Use of the pool 
  4. Use of the entire yard including the bathroom, manmade beach, sunlounging areas etc. within the fence border.

Full Day Rental: $1,000.00 for a group up to 30 people

Half Day Rentals: $500.00 for a group up to 30 people

All Gold Rentals Include:

  1. Parking for up to 10 cars along the front and sides
  2. Use of the outdoor bar/eating area
  3. Use of the pool
  4. Use of the entire yard including the bathroom, manmade beach, sunlounging areas etc. within the fence border.
  5. Use of the tiny house for changing/preping or staging of bridal parties or vip guests

Full Day Rental: $1,800.00 for a group up to 100 people

Half Day Rentals: $900.00 for a group up to 100 people

Parties over 100 people regardless of package type

Full Day Rental: $2,000 for groups 101-150, $2,500 for groups 151-200

Half Day Rentals: $1,200 for groups of 101-150, $1,800 for groups 151-200

MAXIMUM of 250 guests at any time. Guests 201-250 will be charged $75.00 per guest

entry.title: About Hunter Ranch
entry.summary: We are the Hunter Family, a Canadian transplant to Hawaii who moved…
entry.content:
We are the Hunter Family, a Canadian transplant to Hawaii who moved to the island three years ago in search of a dream, Hawaii delivered that dream and we settled in a house cradled in Makaha Valley surrounded by lush mountains.

The property features: a full working bar with sink, pool, tiny house with full bathroom/changing area, an outdoor bathroom, outdoor shower, tons of natural plants including fresh coconuts, oranges, variegated lemons (pink lemons), standard and finger limes, papaya, strawberry guava and standard mango.

We can comfortably park approximately 8 cars at the front and up to 10 along the sides and back of the property. The side and back parking is recommended for small cars only as it is a narrow road and rocky.

With over 1 acres of space there is tons of room to host the event of your dreams. A short walk to Makaha Beach, the property is in an ideal setting for events of any size.
